item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Sunday, January 26, 2025 at 10:10 PM UTC
item.description:

7. When AI Promises Speed but Delivers Debugging Hell (7 points | no comments)

9. Much Faster Suspend & Resume For Some Systems With Linux 6.14 (12 points | 4 comments)
10. OpenAI launches Operator, an AI agent that can do tasks on the web (4 points | 1 comment)

12. What happened to the text colour? (61 points | 19 comments)
13. SDL 3.2.0 (40 points | 6 comments)

21. Supreme Sexp System - SSS - a Lisp machine adventure (6 points | 1 comment)
22. Engineers don't make public squares. People do (9 points | no comments)
23. Use Monoids for Construction (7 points | 3 comments)
